amendatorysection.para: The authority may charge and collect rates, rents, fees, and other charges for the use of and for the services furnished or to be furnished by a project or any portion thereof and contract with any person, partnership, limited liability company, association, or corporation or other body public or private, except that the authority shall have no jurisdiction over rates, rents, fees, and charges established by an eligible institution for its students, patients, residents, clients, or other consumers other than to require that such rates, rents, fees, and charges by such eligible institution be sufficient to discharge such institution's obligation to the authority.
